product_name: Advanced Elements Lagoon 2 Tandem Inflatable Kayak
long_description: The Advanced Elements Lagoon 2(TM) tandem inflatable kayak lets you share the fun of paddling with a partner. The Advanced Elements Lagoon 2 inflatable tandem kayak is constructed of durable materials to provide superb puncture resistance. Top side of kayak is a high-denier polyester and a PVC laminate, and the hull is made of a PVC tarpaulin material that's designed to take a beating without puncturing. Additional inner cover protects inflation tube and enhances stiffness of kayak hull. Rigid bow and stern reinforcements slice gracefully through water; tracking fin is molded into the hull to provide improved handling. 2 supportive seat backs enhance comfort on the water; splash diverting coaming help keep you dry in the cockpit. Easy-to-use Spring(TM) and Twistlok(TM) valves are compatible with most pumps and speed setup time. Bungee deck lacing lets you stow gear easily; molded, low-profile rubber handles allow smooth transport to and from the water. Comes with a maintenance kit, instructions and a heavy-duty duffel bag. Do not under inflate your boat! Advanced Elements recommends inflate with a 12V electric pump, and then top off with a quality hand pump to get up to the recommended pressure.
short_description: The Advanced Elements Lagoon 2(TM) tandem inflatable kayak lets you share the fun of paddling with a partner.
